rprenames.gui.configNotFound:
No configs were found in path "%s".
Configs are creating after updating Resource Packs.
Only featured available
rprenames.gui.playerPreviewTip.holdShift: Hold Shift to view Player Preview
rprenames.gui.playerPreviewTip.pressF: Press "F" to move Item to the next slot
rprenames.config.title: RPRenames
rprenames.config.general.ignoreCEM.toolt: If true, CEM Renames wont be shown in list of Renames
rprenames.config.general.enableAnvilModi: If false, it wont do any modifications of anvil screen
rprenames.config.general.showCreateConfi:
If true, shows checkbox on pack selection screen
that controls "Create renames config Toggle" option
rprenames.config.general.loadModBuiltinR:
If true, adds Mod's built-in Resource Packs
to pack selection screen. If false, it will not
show them. Requires restart
rprenames.config.gui.openByDefault.toolt: If true, opens RP Renames menu automatically
rprenames.config.gui.highlightSlot.toolt: If true, Slot that contains hovered button's Item will be Highlighted
Color of highlighted slot that appears on hovering button in Inventory Tab
How opaque the Color of highlighted slot is. In percents [0 - 100]
rprenames.config.gui.translateMobNames.t: If false, Mob Names in name tag's tooltips will be shown as its ID
If false, Item Names in item's tooltips will be shown as its ID
rprenames.config.gui.enablePreview.toolt: If false, Preview wont be shown
rprenames.config.gui.playerPreviewByDefa: If true, Player Preview will be shown by default instead of Item Preview
rprenames.config.gui.spinMobPreview.tool: If false, Mobs in CEM Preview wont spin and will be fixed at 45 degrees
rprenames.config.gui.spinPlayerPreview.t: If false, Player in Player Preview wont spin and will be fixed at 45 degrees
rprenames.config.gui.disableSnowGolemPum: If false, Snow Golems in name tag's tooltips will be rendered without pumpkin
rprenames.config.gui.alwaysAllowPlayerPr: Always allow Item being equipped on Head in Player Preview
If true, Item will always be able to render on Head in Player Preview
rprenames.config.gui.disablePageArrowsTi: If true, Page Arrows Tips wont be shown if Shift is pressed
rprenames.config.gui.disablePlayerPrevie: If true, Tooltips wont tell Tips about Player Preview
rprenames.config.debug.updateConfig.tool: Update or not config on updating resource packs
rprenames.config.debug.clearConfig.toolt:
Delete config for Renames manually (except favorites)
(It will refresh on next Resource Packs Update if "Update Renames config" is true)
rprenames.config.debug.clearConfig.title: Clear
Open Main RPRenames Config Folder (all configs are stored there)
